briefTitle: Comparison of Analgesic Efficacy of Ultrasound Guided Rhomboid Intercostal Block Versus Serratus Anterior Plane Block for Mastectomy Surgery
officialTitle: Comparison of Analgesic Efficacy of Ultrasound Guided Rhomboid Intercostal Block Versus Serratus Anterior Plane Block for Mastectomy Surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ASA I and II
* female patients
* aged between 20-60 years,
* undergoing modified radical mastectomy surgeries

Exclusion Criteria:

* local skin infection ,
* bleeding disorder ,
* coagulation abnormality ,
* spine or chest deformity ,
* psychiatric disease,
* pregnancy
* patients with allergy to any of the drug used
